This is a kind of sheer material. It's not comfortable, a bit hot really. The neck is very wide. It doesn't really look good on me because of the wide neck. The material is not heavy though, but it's not cotton.

I am an old white lady, and if wearing a dashiki is cultural misappropriation, I do so only because I love them!. I own 3 of these, and I love the colors, the graphics, and the POCKETS. The dashiki is a lightweight 100% cotton, but know that it is not a high-quality, silky cotton. It launders well, but it will shrink some. The construction is very, very basic. Buy a generous size if you like a loose, airy fit as I do. It is wonderful for casual wear, and it costs about the same as a T-shirt.

The color is great, bright and vibrant. I received the item in a very timely fashion. The problem is there was oil, yes oil in the outer package. When I reached in to remove the inner package with the shirt my hand got wet; it wasn't water, it was oil. The good thing was that the seal on the inner packaging kept the oil from getting to the shirt. With the help of another person opening the inner package, I was able to remove the shirt without getting oil on it. I'm sorry but I don't see any way this could have been an accident. There was a lot of oil. I haven't washed it yet so I don't know how the color or fabric will hold up. If I don't forget I will post another review.

评论概述: Order one size up for best fit, gorgeous colors!
评论详情: I have gotten three of these for my husband, he looks great in them and gets lots of compliments. He usually wears XXL but the XXXL fits him best. The first dashiki I got for him was XXL and it is a bit snug....dashikis should have some room to move so the next two I bought a size larger....the XXXL They wash up well on cold on the delicate cycle and I hang them to dry. They will need some light ironing after drying. I especially love the the yellow and black one on him.  I will probably get him more in the future, they are a hit! Thank you Chainupon.
